snippet: James Holmes, the defendant in the Aurora theater shooting,  can be given drugs to reduce his inhibitions, the judge in the case said Monday.
abstract: Colorado Judge William Sylvester gives approval for Aurora theater shooting defendant James Holmes to be given 'truth serum,' drugs to reduce his inhibitions, if he pleads not guilty by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: James Holmes, the defendant in the Aurora theater shooting,  can be given drugs to reduce his inhibitions, the judge in the case said Monday.
